author: AFP
title: UN chief urges govts to protect women during virus lockdown
description: Reports of domestic violence have surged globally in the wake of massive lockdowns imposed to contain the spread of the disease. "Violence is not confined to the battlefield," said Guterres in a statement and video released in multiple languages, days after h…
content:
United Nations: UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres has urged governments to include the protection of women in their response to the deadly novel coronavirus pandemic.
Reports of domestic violence have surged globally in the wake of massive lockdowns impo… [+1307 chars]
